firstNoticeFromCategoryOther.title: 11 April 2017 - Proposal to grant a new lease at Te Henga Park, Bethells Beach

content.text:
Auckland Council invites submissions or objections from persons with an interest in Te Henga Park, Bethells Beach.
Te Henga Park is held in fee simple by Auckland Council under the Local Government Act 2002 (LGA).  
The council proposes issuing a lease for 36m² (more or less) over Part Old River Bed Block I SO 45137 Waitakere, to The Bethels Beach Surf Lifesaving Patrol Incorporated for the storage container adjacent to its clubrooms.  The container will be used for the purposes of storing the surf club’s surf lifesaving and associated gear.  The proposed lease is until 31 August 2020.
A plan showing the area for lease can be requested by phoning Donna Cooper on 09 892 4344 or 021 819 343 or emailing donna.cooper@aucklandcouncil.govt.nz.
Any person wishing to make a submission in respect of the above proposal is required to lodge this in writing to: 
Donna CooperCommunity Lease AdvisorAuckland CouncilPrivate Bag 92300Victoria Street WestAuckland 1142
Submissions should arrive no later than 5.00pm Thursday 11 May 2017. Alternatively, submissions may be emailed to the above address.
Please state in your objection if you wish to be heard in person.
Any objector’s information provided to council will become subject to the Local Government Official Information and Meetings Act 1977 and may be released by council under that Act. Any objector should state in their objection if the whole or part of the objection is to be kept confidential.
content.html:
Auckland Council invites submissions or objections from persons with an interest in Te Henga Park, Bethells Beach.

Te Henga Park is held in fee simple by Auckland Council under the Local Government Act 2002 (LGA). 

The council proposes issuing a lease for 36m² (more or less) over Part Old River Bed Block I SO 45137 Waitakere, to The Bethels Beach Surf Lifesaving Patrol Incorporated for the storage container adjacent to its clubrooms.  The container will be used for the purposes of storing the surf club’s surf lifesaving and associated gear.  The proposed lease is until 31 August 2020.

A plan showing the area for lease can be requested by phoning Donna Cooper on 09 892 4344 or 021 819 343 or emailing donna.cooper@aucklandcouncil.govt.nz.

Any person wishing to make a submission in respect of the above proposal is required to lodge this in writing to:

Donna Cooper
Community Lease Advisor
Auckland Council
Private Bag 92300
Victoria Street West
Auckland 1142

Submissions should arrive no later than 5.00pm Thursday 11 May 2017. Alternatively, submissions may be emailed to the above address.

Please state in your objection if you wish to be heard in person.

Any objector’s information provided to council will become subject to the Local Government Official Information and Meetings Act 1977 and may be released by council under that Act. Any objector should state in their objection if the whole or part of the objection is to be kept confidential.
